response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to acquire a product that is worth $12,000 to me, but tailored specifically to meet your requirements at a more accessible cost. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.", "product_price": 9500}
